actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs

official_title: Expressing the need to raise awareness and promote capacity building to strategically address the lionfish invasion in the Atlantic Ocean.

summary.text: Urges development of a comprehensive, scientifically based, region-wide strategy, including local management plans and international partnerships, to address the lionfish invasion in the Atlantic Ocean. Encourages raising public awareness about the lionfish invasion across the United States and its territories through outreach and education.

titles.title: Expressing the need to raise awareness and promote capacity building to strategically address the lionfish invasion in the Atlantic Ocean.
